text: parvvatannal pealulla tiramala avare mutikkalannal kil‌vanakkam allahuvin matramakkikkeant avaneat avar prart'thikkunnatan‌. ennal avare avan karayilekk raksappetuttumpealea avaril cilar matram maryada palikkunnavarayirikkum. paramavancakanmarum nandikettavarum arellamea, avar matrame nam'mute drstantannal nisedhikkukayullu
